title: Under That Rock
description: Looking under rocks can lead to all kinds of discoveries! Under That Rock introduces readers to a small world of living things. The book can also be used to teach students about sequencing events and identifying adjectives.
reviewWords: grub, silky, slow, smooth, surprises, wiggly
awareness: Initial Blends : Discriminate initial consonant sp- and sn- blends
phonics: Consonant Blends : Identify and categorize initial consonant sp- and sn- blends
wordWork: Concept Words                : Identify and use position words
